gist.headline: Shields Up, Nova Defense!
gist.blurb: A new guardian enters the chat. Nova Defense uses our AI to detect raids and generate defensive imagery for Discord communities.
gist.summary: Added Nova Defense, an AI-powered anti-raid Discord bot, to the community apps showcase.
gist.impact: Discord server owners can now discover a new tool for protecting their communities using Pollinations' detection and image generation capabilities.
gist.visual_concept: Nova Defense implies space/stars and protection. Visualizing the Pollinations bee as a space guardian alongside a friendly robot or shield element.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing a tiny futuristic visor, standing next to a friendly robot holding a glowing star shield. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel space gradient background. Chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'NOVA DEFENSE'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
